channel.title: CVE Feed for NextCode -- all

item.title: CVE-2022-29437|2024-08-03T06:26:04.864Z -- nextcode -- image%20slider%20by%20nextcode%20%E2%80%93%20photo%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in Image Slider by NextCode plugin <= 1.1.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-29438|2024-08-03T06:26:04.890Z -- nextcode -- image%20slider%20by%20nextcode%20%E2%80%93%20photo%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (author or higher user role) Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Image Slider by NextCode plugin <= 1.1.2 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-29439|2024-08-03T06:26:04.876Z -- nextcode -- image%20slider%20by%20nextcode%20%E2%80%93%20photo%20%26%20video%20slider%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Image Slider by NextCode plugin <= 1.1.2 at WordPress allows deleting slides.
